title: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back
writers:
Leigh Brackett, 
Lawrence Kasdan,
George Lucas
actors:
Mark Hamill,
Harrison Ford,
Carrie Fisher
shortDescription: After the Rebels are overpowered by the Empire, Luke Skywalker begins his Jedi training with Yoda, while his friends are pursued across the galaxy by Darth Vader and bounty hunter Boba Fett.

title: The Matrix
actors:
Keanu Reaves,
Laurence Fishburne,
Carrie-Anne Moss
shortDescription: When a beautiful stranger leads computer hacker Neo to a forbidding underworld, he discovers the shocking truth--the life he knows is the elaborate deception of an evil cyber-intelligence.

title: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope
actors:
Mark Hamill,
Harrison Ford,
Carrie Fisher
shortDescription: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a Wookiee and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire's world-destroying battle station, while also attempting to rescue Princess Leia from the mysterious Darth Vader.

title: Back to the Future
actors:
Michael J. Fox,
Christopher Lloyd,
Lea Thompson
shortDescription: Marty McFly, a 17-year-old high school student, is accidentally sent 30 years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his close friend, the maverick scientist Doc Brown.

title: Alien
actors:
Sigourney Weaver,
Tom Skerritt,
John Hurt
shortDescription: The crew of a commercial spacecraft encounter a deadly lifeform after investigating an unknown transmission.

title: Raiders of th Lost Ark
writers:
Lawrence Kasdan, 
George Lucas, 
Philip Kaufman
actors:
Harrison Ford, 
Karen Allen,
Paul Freeman
shortDescription: In 1936, archaeologist and adventurer Indiana Jones is hired by the U.S. government to find the Ark of the Covenant before the Nazis can obtain its awesome powers.

title: Blade Runner
writers:
Hampton Fancher, 
David Webb Peoples, 
Philip K. Dick
actors:
Harrison Ford, 
Rutger Hauer, 
Sean Young
shortDescription: A blade runner must pursue and terminate four replicants who stole a ship in space and have returned to Earth to find their creator.

title: The Terminator
writers:
James Cameron,
Gale Anne Hurd,
William Wisher
actors:
Arnold Schwarzenegger, 
Linda Hamilton, 
Michael Biegn
shortDescription: A human soldier is sent from 2029 to 1984 to stop an almost indestructible cyborg killing machine, sent from the same year, which has been programmed to execute a young woman whose unborn son is the key to humanity's future salvation.

title: The Princess Bride
actors:
Cary Elwes,
Mandy Patinkin,
Robin Wright
shortDescription: A bedridden boy's grandfather reads him the story of a farmboy-turned-pirate who encounters numerous obstacles, enemies and allies in his quest to be reunited with his true love.

title: Star Trek II: The Wrath of Khan
writers:
Gene Roddenberry,
Jack B. Sowards,
Harve Bennett
actors:
William Shatner,
Leonard Nimoy,
DeForest Kelley
shortDescription: With the assistance of the Enterprise crew, Admiral Kirk must stop an old nemesis, Khan Noonien Singh, from using the life-generating Genesis Device as the ultimate weapon.

title: Lagaan: once uppon a time I india
actors: Amir khan,gracy singh
shortDescription: in 1890s India a young farmer leads a rebellion against the british raj by challenging them to a game of cricket,resulting in unexpected consequences and cultural transformation.

title: Rang de basanti
actors: Amir khan,soha ali khan
shortDescription: A group of universit students with no political affliations becomes politically active when they are cast as revolutionaries in a documentary film,ultimately inspiring them to take real life ation against corruption and injustice.

title: Gangs of wasseypur
actors: Manoj,richa chddha
shortDescription: A gripping saga of vengeance and power struggles spanning multiple generation in the coal mafia of wasseypur.

title: 3 Idiots
actors: Amir khan,sharman joshi
shortDescription: Two friends embark on a quest to find their long-lost college companion and radiscover their purpose in life, challenging the conventional nors of society and education in the process.

title: Dil wale dulhania le jayenge
actors: Shahrukh khan, kajol
shortDescription: A young man tries to win the approval of his girlfriend's traditional Indian father.

title: The godfather
actors: Marlon brando
shortDescription: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son,trigerring a series of events and a struggle for power.

title: The shawshank Redemption
actors: Tim robbins,Morgan
shortDescription: two imprisoned men forge a lifelong friendship as they find solace and redemption through acts of common decency.

title: Sholay
actors: Amitabh Bachhan
shortDescription: Two criminals veeru and jai are hired by a retierd police officer to capture the ruthless dacoit gabbar singh.

title: Taare zameen par
actors: Darsheel,amir khan
shortDescription: A dyslexic child find solace and understanding with an unconventional art teacher who helps him overcome his learning difficulties

title: baahubali
actors: Prabhas,Tamanna bhatia
shortDescription: In ancient india,a young prince embarks on a perilous journey to rescue his captive mother and reclaim his kingdom from an evil emperor, unveiling shocking truths along the way.
